name: Bee! Times Table Game
description: Experience a fun, new way to learn the Times Tables by playing as an interactive bee who must find 15 flowers that have the correct answer. Choose from the numbers 0-10 to practice, and enjoy a fun, non-stressful, untimed game. Have your bee find power-ups for speed, and even a secret portal from one side to the other! A great game for kids who stress out over the more common fast paced Math Games.
